alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Darke; Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 7:58PM EDT until July 20 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR WESTERN SHELBY...NORTHEASTERN DARKE...SOUTHWESTERN AUGLAIZE AND SOUTHEASTERN MERCER COUNTIES... At 758 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Versailles, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Minster, Versailles, Newport, Fort Loramie, Russia, Osgood, Yorkshire, Egypt, Lake Loramie State Park, Mccartyville, Willowdell, Houston and Brock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
